Title: Grand Master Aki
Description:
You have fought hard and well against the trainers of Azeroth. Even the grand masters have fallen to your cunning tactics.

I now await you in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms, for you have earned the privilege to face me in battle. Come, $n, and let us see if you have what it takes to defeat me.
ObjectivesText: Defeat Aki the Chosen in a pet battle.
PortraitGiverText: It is time to face me.
